originalText.text:
Being accident prone I’ve had past experiences with physical therapy, but nothing as effective and results driven as my work with Shereen Tan at the Chelsea location.  She has a no- nonsense and direct approach that works wonders.  She worked on my wrist and hand following a bad fracture that required a complicated operation + some serious metal hardware. After a few weeks I was back in business gaining mobility and strength.
If you want quick and effective results she is the real deal,  plus being truly nice and having a refreshing sense of humor.
The whole staff couldn’t have more professional and nice.

She has a no- nonsense and direct approach that works wonders.  She worked on my wrist and hand following a bad fracture that required a complicated operation + some serious metal hardware. If you want quick and effective results she is the real deal,  plus being truly nice and having a refreshing sense of humor.
The whole staff couldn’t have more professional and nice.

originalText.text:
Having had hand surgery twice in two years and seen Shereen each time for PT, I  can honestly say there is nowhere else I would go. I recently “graduated” and returned to work with no problems. Here is the review I wrote in 2017. It’s as true now as it was then:

Shereen is WONDERFUL. I just finished eight weeks of hand therapy post surgery. It was well worth the commute into Manhattan.

Shereen is knowledgeable, personable and caring. She was not only concerned about the therapy I received at Cynergy, but with the overall picture of my rehabilitation. In a subtle way, Shereen kept me from doing too much, too fast, while I was at home. As a result, my finger movement and hand strength progressed steadily. My job involves the constant use of my hands. Thanks to Shereen I have complete confidence that there will be no issues when I return to work next week.

originalText.text: I have Ehlers-Danlos and injure my hands easily, inhibiting healing and causing a lot of persistent pain. Thus far the work done with Shereen Tan has been incredibly helpful in reducing pain, identifying weakness, gaining strength safely, splinting to avoid possible injuries, taping to relieve pain as well as inhibit hypermobility that worsens injury. There's a lot of education that happens each session, which has helped me readdress the things I struggle with daily and learn how to take better care of myself when working, healing, resting, or just doing day to day activities. Definitely the best PT and PT group I've found in a decade.

Definitely the best PT and PT group I've found in a decade.

originalText.text: Shereen has helped me resolve a range of different issues over the past 6-7 years. I have tried seeing other PTs, but none have compared to Shereen. She is the best! She has treated all of my issues completely and sets me up to maintain what has healed. She is skilled at diagnosing root causes of problems and treating for those. In addition to being highly experienced, she has a natural intuition and loves what she does. Her approach is personable and kind.

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience here with Shereen and the entire office.  I wouldn’t have gotten through recovery without them
